scripts.build: npm run lint && webpack --mode production && node src/scripts/compile-html.js && webpack --mode production --config sw.webpack.config.js
scripts.build:clean:windows: cd public/assets && del css /s /q && del js /s /q && cd ../../ && npm run build
scripts.build:ci: npm run build:scripts && npm run compile:webpack && mkdir public/assets/{css,js} && npm run build && rm public/assets/css/style-bundle.js
scripts.test: npm run lint:test && set FIRESTORE_EMULATOR_HOST=localhost:5002 && firebase emulators:exec --only firestore "jest --detectOpenHandles"
scripts.lint:test: npm run compile:webpack && npx eslint test/**/*.ts --plugin jest --env jest --rule guard-for-in:0 --rule no-redeclare:0 --rule no-return-await:0
